meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Penstemon, typically with tubular flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with colorful beardtongues swaying in the breeze.
meanings.sent2: I planted a beardtongue in my backyard to attract hummingbirds.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzzed happily around the beardtongue, enjoying its sweet nectar.
meanings.sent4: The beardtongue stood tall like a trumpet announcing the arrival of spring.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the beardtongue danced gracefully in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: A person who has a beard that resembles a tongue.
meanings.sent1: The bearded man was jokingly called a beardtongue by his friends.
meanings.sent2: In the costume party, he dressed up as a beardtongue, complete with a fake tongue beard.
meanings.sent3: The beardtongue chuckled as he stroked his beard, amused by his own appearance.
meanings.sent4: His beard was so long and bushy, it looked like a beardtongue ready to speak.
meanings.sent5: The beardtongue's beard was so unique, it became the talk of the town.
